about_the_game:
This is a casual game. In this mysterious VR game, you will play a brave knight, a vast desert road, and a thrilling horse ride competition with a number of nuns. The game adopts the first perspective mode. Players can feel the speed of the horse's running and the beauty of the scenery, making you seem to be in a real equestrian competition.



When the game starts, you will experience the unique atmosphere of the desert and the heat of the sun. You are galloping down the road on a noble horse. The nuns are by your side, and their horses are galloping fast. You can feel the running speed of the horses and the whistling of the wind, as if you are in the real world.



Of course, competitive games will definitely have other characters competing with players. There will be a variety of horses competing with players in the arena. In the game, players can also choose different horses, and each horse has its own Features and abilities, players can choose a partner that suits them according to their preferences. In the game, the player needs to control the moving direction and viewing angle of the horse through the joystick, which makes you more flexible and comfortable in the game. Please pay attention to the timing of the start. If you don't react fast enough, you will be left behind by the large army.



In addition, the track scene of the game is also very real. It is an excellent casual competitive game. Whether you are an equestrian enthusiast or an ordinary player, you can experience the excitement and fun of horse riding competitions through this game. If you also want to feel the speed of horses running and the beauty of the scenery, come and download this game and enjoy the fun of horse riding competitions together!

Operation method:

Move left handle up/down/left/right
Steering Right Joystick Left/Right
Reset position Left handle grip key
Menu handle menu key
